model
Class Publisher

java.lang.Object
  model.Publisher
Direct Known Subclasses:
Automaton, EventsModel, GraphModel, IDESWorkspace
public class Publisher
extends java.lang.Object

State participant of the Observer design pattern. Registers and notifies all observers of changes to shared data. FSA data models requiring multiple concurrent views should extend this class.

Author:
helen bretzke

          Notifies (calls update on) all of my observers except the given one (assuming that it was the one that sent the notification.)

public void notifyAllSubscribers()
Notifies (calls update on) all of my observers.

notifyAllBut

public void notifyAllBut(Subscriber observer)
Notifies (calls update on) all of my observers except the given one (assuming that it was the one that sent the notification.)

attach

public void attach(Subscriber observer)
Attaches the given observer to this model object. This observer will receive notifications of changes to this model.

Parameters:
observer -

detach

public void detach(Subscriber observer)
Detaches the given observer to this model object. This observer will no longer receive notifications of changes to this model.

Parameters:
observer -
